column2: "Iyi nye Manaasɛ n'ebusuakuw kyɛfa: osiandɛ ɔyɛ Josef n'abakan. Manaasɛ n'abakan Makir
column4: osiandɛ ɔyɛ ɔsabarimba no ntsi onyaa Gilead nye Basan."

column2: "Na kyɛfa no yɛ Manaasɛmba nkaa no dze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee. Iyinom nye Abiezermba
column7: nye Semidamba no dze: woyinom nye Josef babanyin Manaasɛ ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."

column2: "Na Zelofehad a n'egya nye Hefer a ɔyɛ Manaasɛ ne babanyin Makir ne babanyin no dze
column3: oennya mbabanyin dɛ mbabaa ara nko: na iyinom nye ne mbabaa no hɔn edzin

column6: EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses dɛ ɔmma hɛn egyapadze wɔ hɛn nuanom mu: dɛm ntsi ɔmaa hɔn egyapadze wɔ hɔn egya no nuanom no mu dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm no tse."

column3: ɔsor Gilead nye Basan asaase a ɔwɔ Jordan egya no;"

column2: "osiandɛ Manaasɛ mbabaa no nyaa egyapadze wɔ ne mbabanyin no mu: na Gilead asaase no yɛɛ Manaasɛ mbabanyin nkaa no dze."
"Na Manaasɛ ne he fi Aser kɔ Mikemetat (Mikmethath) a ɔwɔ Sekem enyim no; na ɔhe no dze nam enyimfa araa kodu Entapuafo ehyiae."
"Tappua asaase no yɛ Manaasɛ dze: na Tappua a ɔwɔ Manaasɛ he do no dze ɔyɛ Efraimmba no dze."
"Na ɔhe no sian kɔ Kana ɔwora no ho
column3: wɔ ɔwora no no pomu afamu: nkurow yi yɛ Efraim dze wɔ Manaasɛ no nkurow no mu: na Manaasɛ ne he no ɔwɔ ɔwora no no kwaamu afamu
column4: na n'edzifir wɔ po no ho:"

column3: na kwaamu afamu no Manaasɛ dze a
column4: na po no nye ne he; na okehyia Aser wɔ kwaamu afamu."

column2: "Na Manaasɛ nyae wɔ Isakar nye Aser mu Bɛt-sean nye no ho nkurow
column4: nye hɔn a wɔtse Dor nye no ho nkurow
column5: hɔn a wɔtse En-dor nye no ho nkurow
column7: na hɔn a wɔtse Megiddo nye no ho nkurow

column2: "Naaso Manaasɛmba enntum enntu hɔn a wɔtsetse nkurow no mu no; na Keenanfo no pɛɛ dɛ wɔtsena asaase no do."

column3: Israelmba no ho yɛɛ dzen no
column4: wɔhyɛɛ Keenanfo no ma wɔyɛɛ ɔsom edwuma mu
column5: na mbom woenntu hɔn ase korakora."

column2: "Na Josefmba no kaa kyerɛɛ Josua dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na edze egyapadze kyɛfa kor nye nkyekyɛmu kor pɛ ama me
column4: w'enyiwa tua dɛ meyɛ ɔman kɛse
column5: susuampa dɛ EWURADZE ehyira me araa dze ebodu ber yi?"

column4: nna fow kɔ kwaa no mu
column5: na kobu hɔ fa ma woho wɔ Perizfo nye Refafo asaase no do; osiandɛ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no suar dodow ma wo."

column3: Nkokodo nkurow no nndɔɔ so mma hɛn: na Keenanfo a wɔtsetse ɔbɔn no n'asaase do nyinara wɔwowɔ dadze ntseaseanam
column4: hɔn a wɔwɔ Bɛt-sean nye no ho nkurow nye hɔn a wɔwɔ Jezreel ɔbɔn no mu nyina."

column6: na ewɔ tum kɛse: nnyɛ kyɛfa kor pɛ bi na ibenya:"

column2: "mbom nkokodo nkurow no nyɛ wodze; osiandɛ ɔyɛ kwaa mpo a
column4: na n'edzifir bɛyɛ wodze: osiandɛ ibotu Keenanfo no
